com.andoverrobotics.core.drivetrain

Class DriveTrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andoverrobotics.core.drivetrain.DriveTrain
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StrafingDriveTrain, TankDrive

    public abstract class DriveTrain
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the interface for an ordinary DriveTrain object with support for a default motor power.

                                   double power)
        Drives forwards a specific distance at a specific power.
        Parameters:
        distanceInInches - The distance to travel, in inches
        power - The power to drive at, between 0 and 1, inclusive

      • setMovementPower

        public abstract void setMovementPower(double power)
        Sets the power to move at.
        Parameters:
        power - The power, between -1 and 1, inclusive. Positive is forwards, negative is backwards

      • setRotationPower

        public abstract void setRotationPower(double power)
        Sets the rotation power.
        Parameters:
        power - The power, between -1 and 1, inclusive. Positive is clockwise, negative is counterclockwise

      • setMovementAndRotation

        public abstract void setMovementAndRotation(double movePower,
                                            double rotatePower)
        Sets the power to move at and rotate at.
        Parameters:
        movePower - The power to move at, between -1 and 1, inclusive. Positive is forwards, negative is backwards
        rotatePower - The power to rotate at, between -1 and 1, inclusive. Positive is clockwise, negative is counterclockwise

        public void stop()
        Stops the motor(s).
